summary.span: 提供使用户能够更改其网站密码的用户界面。

span.span: Provides a user interface that enable users to change their Web site password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [发送电子邮件Sending Email Messages](#sending_email_messages) - [ViewsViews](#views) - [样式和模板Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [验证分组Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings) - [访问键和选项卡索引Access Keys and Tab Indexes](#access_keys_and_tab_indexes) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [在 Page_Load 和 Page_Init 期间访问控件Accessing Controls During Page_Load and Page_Init](#accessing_controls_during_page_load_and_page_init) - [应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [声明性语法#Declarative Syntax#](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用页面上的控件，使网站用户能够更改登录到您的网站时所用的密码。Use the control on a page to enable your Web site users to change the passwords they use to log on to your Web site. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 中提供的登录控件集，请在继续操作之前先阅读[ASP.NET Login Controls 概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d(v=vs.100))。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, read [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员身份管理用户](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过 HTTP 传输密码是潜在的安全威胁。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. 恶意用户可以查看或破坏 HTTP 传输。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 若要在使用登录控件时提高安全性，应将 HTTPS 协议与安全套接字层（SSL）加密一起使用，以确保在回发过程中无法读取用户的密码。To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 控件使用属性中定义的成员资格提供程序来更改为网站的成员资格提供程序数据存储区中存储的密码。 The control uses the membership provider defined in the property to change the password stored in the membership provider data store for the Web site. 如果未分配成员资格提供程序， 则控件将使用 web.config 文件的[成员资格](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)部分中定义的默认成员资格提供程序。If you do not assign a membership provider, the control uses the default membership provider defined in the [membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) section of the Web.config file. 控件使用户能够执行以下操作：The control enables users to perform the following actions: - 如果登录，请更改其密码。Change their password if they are logged on. - 如果用户未登录，则更改其密码，前提是包含控件的页允许匿名访问 ，属性为`true`。Change their password if they are not logged on, as long as the page that contains the control allows anonymous access and the property is `true`. - 更改用户帐户的密码，即使他们以其他用户身份登录。Change the password for a user account, even if they are logged on as a different user. 这要求属性`true`为。This requires the property to be `true`. 将属性设置为`true`可显示 "用户名" 文本框，用户可以在其中键入用户名。 Setting the property to `true` displays the User Name text box, which allows the user to type in a user name. 如果用户已登录， 则会用登录用户的名称填充控件。If the user is logged on, the control is populated with the name of the logged-on user. 更改了给定用户名的密码后，用户将登录到与已更改的密码关联的帐户，即使该用户以前未登录到该帐户也是如此。After the password for the given user name is changed, the user is logged on to the account associated with the changed password, even if the user was not logged on to that account previously. > [!IMPORTANT] > 接受用户输入是潜在的安全威胁。Accepting user input is a potential security threat. 恶意用户可以发送旨在公开漏洞或运行尝试生成的密码的程序的数据。Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords. 若要在使用用户输入时提高安全性，应使用控件的验证功能并保护为控件配置的任何数据访问接口。To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)、 [Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)以及[保护成员身份](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad), and [Securing Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7). ## 发送电子邮件Sending Email Messages 此控件可配置为使用电子邮件服务向用户发送新密码。The control can be configured to use email services to send the new password to the user. 若要将电子邮件发送到 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件中的用户，必须在应用程序的 web.config 文件中配置电子邮件服务器。To send email messages to users from any of ASP.NET Web server controls, you must configure an email server in the Web.config file for your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[笔尖：如何在 IIS 6.0 中安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For more information, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 电子邮件使用类进行配置。Email messages are configured using the class. 必须将属性设置为指示 ASP.NET 发送电子邮件。You must set the property to instruct ASP.NET to send email. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在电子邮件中发送用户帐户名或密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件通常以纯文本方式发送，可由特殊网络 "探查" 应用程序读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)中所述的缓解措施。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). > [!NOTE] > 不能保证用户接收或查看电子邮件。It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an email message. 若要验证用户是否已收到消息，请在电子邮件中提供一个确认链接，该链接允许用户确认是否已收到通知。To verify that a user has received a message, provide a confirmation link in the email message that lets the user confirm that the notification was received. ## 视图Views 控件有两个状态或视图：The control has two states, or views: - 更改密码视图请求当前密码，并要求用户键入新密码两次以确认。Change Password view Requests the current password, and requires the user to type the new password twice for confirmation. 如果允许未登录的用户更改其密码，请将属性设置为`true` ，以在 "更改密码 " 视图中显示该控件。If you allow users who are not logged on to change their passwords, set the property to `true` to display the control in Change Password view. 控件允许用户提供其注册的用户名。The control allows the user to provide their registered user name. 如果在更改密码时出错，"更改密码" 视图中将显示一条错误消息，允许用户重试。If there is an error when changing the password, an error message is displayed in the Change Password view, allowing the user to try again. - 成功视图用于确认密码已更改。Success view Provides confirmation that the password has been changed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 更改密码的功能和 "继续" 和 "取消" 将附加到具有正确命令名称的任何按钮，无论按钮放置在哪个视图上。The functionality for changing passwords and for continue and cancel is attached to any button that has the correct command name, regardless of which view the button is placed on. 例如，在 "成功" 视图中`commandname=changepassword`具有值的按钮将尝试更改密码，并引发异常。For example, a button with the value `commandname=changepassword` in the Success view will attempt to change the password and result in an exception. ## 样式和模板Styles and Templates 您可以使用一组丰富的样式属性来自定义控件的外观。You can use an extensive set of style properties to customize the appearance of the control. 或者，如果您需要完全控制控件的外观，则可以将自定义模板应用于这两个视图。Alternatively, you can apply custom templates to the two views if you need complete control over the appearance of the control. 如果为视图定义模板，则将应用这些属性。If you define a template for a view, the properties are applied. 有关必须在视图模板中设置的控件的列表，请参见和属性。For a list of the controls that you must set in the view templates, see the and properties. 控件检查模板中的内容，如果找不到所需的控件、未正确命名或类型错误，则会引发异常。The control examines the content in the template and throws an exception if a required control is not found, is not named correctly, or is of the wrong type. 例如，如果使用模板中的内容并将属性设置为`true`，则当找不到用户名的或某个其他控件时，将引发异常。For example, if you use the content in the template and set the property to `true`, the will throw an exception if a or some other control is not found for the user name. 下表列出了控件样式属性，并说明了它们影响的 UI 元素。The following table lists the control style properties and describes which UI element they affect. 有关每种样式应用到的属性的列表，请参阅各个样式属性。For a list of the properties to which each style applies, see the individual style property. |style 属性 style property|UI 元素UI element| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| ||"更改密码" 视图上的 "取消" 按钮。Cancel button on the Change Password view.| ||更改密码视图上的密码按钮。Change Password button on the Change Password view.| ||"成功" 视图中的 "继续" 按钮。Continue button on the Success view.| ||向用户显示的错误文本。Error text displayed to the user.| ||指向其他页面的超链接。Hyperlinks to other pages.| ||描述如何使用控件的页面上的说明文本。Instructional text on the page that describes how to use the control.| ||所有输入字段（如文本框）的标签。Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||有关为网站提供可接受的密码的提示。Hints for providing an acceptable password for the Web site.| ||成功更改密码后向用户显示的文本。Text displayed to the user when the password has been successfully changed.| ||文本输入字段。Text entry input fields.| ||"更改密码" 和 "成功" 视图的标题。Titles for the Change Password and Success views.| ## 应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles 控件使您可以在标记中指定 CSS 样式规则。The control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup. 如果使用模板来自定义控件的外观，则可以在模板的标记中指定 CSS 样式。If you use templates to customize the appearance of the control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates. 在这种情况下，不需要额外的外部表。In that case, no extra outer table is required. 您可以通过将属性设置为来`false`阻止呈现该表。You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the property to `false`. ## 验证分组Validation Groupings 控件使用验证组，以便可以单独验证同一页上的其他字段。 The control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the control can be validated separately. 默认情况下， 控件的属性用作验证组的名称。By default, the property of the control is used as the name of the validation group. 例如， 具有 ID `"ChangePassword1"`的控件也将使用验证组名称`ChangePassword1` 。For example, a control with the ID `"ChangePassword1"` will use a validation group name of `ChangePassword1` as well. 若要设置控件所属的验证组，您必须使用控件创建一个模板，然后更改验证组名称。To set the validation group that the control is part of, you must create a template with the control, and then change the validation group name. 若要在用户将控件留空时显示错误消息，请向页面中添加一个控件。To show error messages if a user leaves a control empty, add a control to the page. 将控件的属性设置为控件的属性。 Set the property of the control to the property of the control. ## 访问键和选项卡索引Access Keys and Tab Indexes 有关如何使用控件的属性和属性的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For information about how to use the property and the property of a control, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 在 Page_Load 和 Page_Init 期间访问控件Accessing Controls During Page_Load and Page_Init 文本框（如和）表示的控件属性可在页面生命周期的所有阶段中访问。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as and , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 具体而言，在 Page_Init 和 Page_Load 阶段，这些属性的值与呈现控件时的值相同。In particular, during the Page_Init and Page_Load phases, these properties have the same value they had when the control was rendered. 如果用户通过 修改文本框来更改属性的值，则在发生更改的事件时，新值将可用，这会在 Page_Load 阶段之后发生。If the user changes the value of the property by modifying the text box, the new value will be available when the changed event is raised, which occurs after the Page_Load phase. 因此，如果你在 Page_Init 阶段或 Page_Load 阶段设置属性的值并为事件提供自定义处理程序，则用户在文本框中所做的任何更改都会覆盖 Page_Init 中设置的值或Page_Load 阶段。Therefore, if you set the value of the property in the Page_Init phase or Page_Load phase and provide a custom handler for a event, any change that the user makes in the text box overrides the value set in the Page_Init or Page_Load phase. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性以定义用于检查密码的正则表达式，以确保它们符合以下条件：The following code example shows how to set the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria: - 超过6个字符。Are greater than six characters. - 包含至少一个数字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一个特殊字符（非字母数字）。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 属性中包含的密码要求将显示给用户。The password requirements contained in the property are displayed to the user. 如果用户输入的密码不满足属性的要求，则会向用户显示该属性中包含的文本。If the password entered by the user does not meet the requirements of the property, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果未输入新密码，则会向用户显示该属性中包含的文本。If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. > [!NOTE] > 新密码必须满足、 和属性中的[成员资格提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)所设置的最低要求。The new password must meet the minimum requirements set by the [membership provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f) in the , , and properties. 如果密码不符合这些要求， 则会引发事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. [!code-aspx-csharp[ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex/CS/changepasswordpasswordregexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex/VB/changepasswordpasswordregexvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 表示“取消”按钮的 值。

span.span: Represents the value of the Cancel button.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段表示 "取消" 按钮的值。 `CommandName` Use the field to represent the `CommandName` value of the Cancel button. 当配置任何按钮以模拟控件的 "取消" 按钮的功能时，此功能很有用。This is useful when configuring any button to mimic the functionality of the Cancel button of the control. 若要为控件中包含的任何控件分配取消功能，请将按钮的属性设置为字段中包含的字符串。To assign cancel functionality to any control contained in the control, set the property of the button to the string that is contained in the field. "取消" 按钮可以出现在 ChangePassword 模板或 Success 模板上。The Cancel button can appear on the ChangePassword template or the Success template. 单击 "成功" 模板上的 "取消" 按钮将不会撤消密码更改;它将清除文本框。Clicking the Cancel button on the Success template will not undo the password change; it will clear the text boxes. 若要将自定义功能添加到 "取消" 按钮，请为事件创建一个事件处理程序。To add custom functionality to the Cancel button, create an event handler for the event.

summary.span: 获取一个对定义 控件上“取消”按钮外观的 属性集的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of the Cancel button on the control.

value.span: 定义“取消”按钮外观的 对象。

span.span: A object that defines the appearance of the Cancel button.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用于自定义属性的样式设置。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |设置Setting|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|"取消" 按钮的颜色。The color of the Cancel button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|"取消" 按钮周围边框的颜色。The color of the border around the Cancel button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|"取消" 按钮周围边框的样式。The style of the border around the Cancel button. 样式可以是`"None"` `"Dotted"` 、 `"Solid"` 、、、 `"Double"`、 、、 `"Ridge"` 或。 `"Outset"` `"Dashed"` `"Groove"` `"Inset"`The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 默认值为 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 除非设置大于2， `BorderWidth`否则某些样式不会清晰显示。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` setting is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|"取消" 按钮周围边框的宽度。The width of the border around the Cancel button.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现 "取消" 按钮的级联样式表（CSS）类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Cancel button. 如果指定了其他设置，则它们将重写样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true`若要以粗体显示 "取消" 按钮文本，则为。`true` to display the Cancel button text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true`若要以斜体显示 "取消" 按钮文本，则为。`true` to display the Cancel button text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true`如果为，则显示 "取消" 按钮文本并在其上方显示一行。`true` to display the Cancel button text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|对象形式的 "取消" 按钮的文本大小。The size of the text in the Cancel button as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true`显示 "取消" 按钮文本显示为带删除线。`true` to display the Cancel button text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true`显示带下划线的 "取消" 按钮文本。`true` to display the Cancel button text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|"取消" 按钮中的文本颜色。The color of the text in the Cancel button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.|

summary.span: 在用户帐户的密码更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the password is changed for a user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在属性 中指定的成员资格提供程序更改密码后，将引发事件。The event is raised after the password is changed by the membership provider specified in the property. 引发事件后，将发生以下情况：After the event is raised, the following occurs: - 如果设置了属性，则控件会尝试向用户发送电子邮件。If the property is set, the control attempts to send an email message to the user. - 用户被重定向到属性中指定的网站，或显示在属性中指定的控件模板。The user is either redirected to the Web site specified in the property or the control template specified in the property is displayed. 在事件之后、 事件发生之前设置用户的新授权令牌。The new authorization token for the user is set after the event but before the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 表示“更改密码”按钮的 值。

span.span: Represents the value of the Change Password button.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段可以表示 "更改`CommandName`密码" 按钮的值。 Use the field to represent the `CommandName` value of the Change Password button. 当配置任何按钮以模拟控件的 "更改密码" 按钮的功能时，此功能很有用。This is useful when configuring any button to mimic the functionality of the Change Password button of the control. "更改密码" 按钮完成控件中的最后一个步骤。The Change Password button completes the last step in the control. 若要为控件中包含的任何控件分配更改密码功能，请将按钮的属性设置为字段中包含的字符串。To assign change-password functionality to any control contained in the control, set the property of the button to the string that is contained in the field. "更改密码" 按钮可以出现在 ChangePassword 模板或 Success 模板上。The Change Password button can appear on the ChangePassword template or the Success template. 在这两种情况下，单击 "更改密码" 按钮将调用成员资格提供程序以更改密码。In both cases, clicking the Change Password button calls the membership provider to change the password. 若要将自定义功能添加到 "更改密码" 按钮，请为事件创建一个事件处理程序。To add custom functionality to the Change Password button, create an event handler for the event.

|-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|"更改密码" 按钮的颜色。The color of the Change Password button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|"更改密码" 按钮周围边框的颜色。The color of the border around the Change Password button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|"更改密码" 按钮周围边框的样式。The style of the border around the Change Password button. 样式可以是`"None"` `"Dotted"` 、 `"Solid"` 、、、 `"Double"`、 、、 `"Ridge"` 或。 `"Outset"` `"Dashed"` `"Groove"` `"Inset"`The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 默认值为 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 如果`BorderWidth`值大于2，则某些样式不会清晰显示。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|"更改密码" 按钮周围边框的宽度。The width of the border around the Change Password button.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现 "更改密码" 按钮的级联样式表（CSS）类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Change Password button. 如果指定了其他设置，则它们将重写样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true`若要以粗体显示 "更改密码" 按钮文本，则为。`true` to display the Change Password button text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true`显示 "更改密码" 按钮文本，以斜体显示。`true` to display the Change Password button text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true`显示 "更改密码" 按钮文本，并在其上方显示一行。`true` to display the Change Password button text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|作为对象的 "更改密码" 按钮中的文本大小。The size of the text in the Change Password button as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true`显示 "更改密码" 按钮文本显示为带删除线。`true` to display the Change Password button text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true`显示带下划线的 "更改密码" 按钮文本。`true` to display the Change Password button text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|"更改密码" 按钮中的文本颜色。The color of the text in the Change Password button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`| ，它表示 "更改密码" 按钮的高度。A that represents the height of the Change Password button.| |`Width`| ，它表示 "更改密码" 按钮的宽度。A that represents the width of the Change Password button.|

summary.span: 当更改用户帐户的密码出错时发生。

span.span: Occurs when there is an error changing the password for the user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性 中指定的成员资格提供程序在尝试更改用户帐户的密码时遇到错误时，将引发事件。The event is raised when the membership provider specified in the property encounters an error while attempting to change the password for a user account. 如果用户输入不正确的当前密码或无效的新密码，就会发生这种情况。This can occur if the user enters an incorrect current password or an invalid new password. 指定的对象不表示更改密码失败的原因，只是密码未更改。The specified object does not indicate the reason why changing the password failed, only that the password was not changed. 当密码未更改时，使用事件执行自定义操作。 Use the event to perform custom actions when the password is not changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当成员资格提供程序拒绝用户输入的密码时，将显示属性。The property is displayed when the membership provider rejects the password entered by the user. 对象不返回拒绝新密码的原因。The object does not return a reason for rejecting the new password. 如果希望向用户提供有关如何输入可接受密码的提示（例如，指示必须提供强密码），请使用事件来检查拒绝的密码。 Use the event to examine the rejected password if you want to provide the user with a tip on how to enter an acceptable password (for example, to indicate that a strong password must be provided). 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定控件 使用的对象。 The property specifies the object used by the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：动态创建 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件模板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4)。For more information, see [How To: Create ASP.NET Web Server Control Templates Dynamically](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4). 模板是一组 HTML 元素和控件，它们构成控件特定部分的布局。A template is a set of HTML elements and controls that make up the layout for a particular portion of a control. 模板不同于样式：Templates differ from styles: - 模板定义控件的部分内容。Templates define the content of a section of a control. - 样式指定控件中元素的外观。Styles specify the appearance of elements in the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Web 服务器控件模板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae)和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see [Web Server Controls Templates](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae) and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 下表列出了控件支持的模板和相应的控件视图。The following table lists the templates and the corresponding control view that are supported by the control. |模板名称Template name|控件视图Control view| |-------------------|------------------| ||更改密码Change Password| ||成功Success| 你还可以在 .aspx 文件中创建或修改控件的模板。You can also create or modify the template for a control in your .aspx file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：以声明方式创建 ASP.NET Web 控件模板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a)和[如何：动态创建 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件模板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4)。For more information, see [How to: Create ASP.NET Web Control Templates Declaratively](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a) and [How To: Create ASP.NET Web Server Control Templates Dynamically](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4). 这些主题中的过程不要求你配置属性。The procedures in those topics do not require you to configure the property. 如果确实要配置模板，下表列出了模板的必需和可选控件。If you do configure the template, the following table lists the required and optional controls for the template. |控件 IDControl ID|控件类型Control type|必需/可选Required/optional| |----------------|------------------|------------------------| |`Cancel`|导致事件冒泡（将事件传递给服务器控件层次结构）的任何控件，如、 和控件。Any control that causes event bubbling (passing the event up the server control hierarchy), such as the , , and controls. 必须将按钮命令名称设置为控件 ID。The button command name must be set to the control ID.|OptionalOptional| |`ChangePassword`|导致事件冒泡（将事件传递给服务器控件层次结构）的任何控件，如、 和控件。Any control that causes event bubbling (passing the event up the server control hierarchy), such as the , , and controls. 必须将按钮命令名称设置为控件 ID。The button command name must be set to the control ID.|OptionalOptional| |`ConfirmNewPassword`|支持接口的任何类型，如类。Any type that supports the interface, such as the class.|OptionalOptional| |`Continue`|导致事件冒泡（将事件传递给服务器控件层次结构）的任何控件，如、 和控件。Any control that causes event bubbling (passing the event up the server control hierarchy), such as the , , and controls. 必须将按钮命令名称设置为控件 ID。The button command name must be set to the control ID. 此控件显示在 "成功" 模板上。This control appears on the Success template.|OptionalOptional| |`CurrentPassword`|支持接口的任何类型，如类。Any type that supports the interface, such as the class.|必需Required| |`FailureText`|支持接口的任何类型。Any type that supports the interface.|OptionalOptional| |`NewPassword`|支持接口的任何类型，如类。Any type that supports the interface, such as the class.|必需Required| |`UserName`|支持接口的任何类型。Any type that supports the interface.|如果为， `true`则为必需。Required if is `true`. 如果为， `false`则必须不存在。Must be absent if is `false`.| 如果模板不包含所需的控件，则该控件引发异常。The control throws an exception if the template does not contain the required controls. 如果将可选控件 ID 赋给错误类型的控件，则不会引发异常;不过，控件随后将忽略该控件。No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the control.

summary.span: 在成员资格提供程序更改用户帐户的密码之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the password for a user account is changed by the membership provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用属性中指定的成员资格提供程序来更改用户帐户的密码之前，会引发事件。 The event is raised before the membership provider specified in the property is called to change the password for a user account. 使用事件可执行更改密码之前所需的任何处理，如检查新密码以确保它不在常用密码列表中。Use the event to perform any processing that is necessary before changing the password, such as checking the new password to make sure it is not in a list of common passwords. 在事件之后、 事件发生之前设置用户的新授权令牌。The new authorization token for the user is set after the event but before the event. 如果事件处理程序确定不应调用成员资格提供程序， `true`则可以通过将对象的属性设置为来取消该事件。The event can be canceled by setting the property of the object to `true` if the event handler determines that the membership provider should not be called. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页，该页面使用控件，并包含名为`ChangingPassword`的事件的处理程序。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. 事件处理程序中的代码将属性中存储的旧密码与存储在中的新密码进行比较。The code in the event handler compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果这两个密码相同，则密码更改将失败。If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails. 控件将属性设置为`true` ，以使用户能够输入其用户名。 The control sets the property to `true` to enable users to enter their user name. 这意味着用户无需登录即可查看页面。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 此代码示例假定已将 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员身份和窗体身份验证，并且已创建一个用户知道其名称和密码。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：实现简单的窗体身份验证](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The duplicate new password string entered by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用户输入的重复的新密码。The property contains the duplicate new password entered by the user. 您可以使用属性来定义新密码的要求。You can use the property to define the requirements for the new password. 此正则表达式用于在客户端强制实施密码规则。This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side. 与可以在数据存储级别配置并在服务器端强制执行的密码强制无关。The is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level and enforced on the server side. 密码必须满足、 和属性中的[成员资格提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)所设置的最低要求。The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the [membership provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f) in the , , and properties. 如果密码不符合这些要求， 则会引发事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过 HTTP 传输密码是潜在的安全威胁。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. 恶意用户可以查看或破坏 HTTP 传输。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 若要在使用登录控件时提高安全性，应使用具有安全套接字层（SSL）加密的 HTTPS 协议，以确保在回发过程中无法读取用户的密码。To improve security when using login controls, you should use the HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 获取或设置当用户输入的新密码和重复输入密码不一致时显示的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets the message that is displayed when the new password and the duplicate password entered by the user are not identical.

value.span: 当新密码和重复输入密码不一致时显示的错误消息。

span.span: The error message displayed when the new password and confirmed password are not identical.

value.span: 默认值为：“确认新密码”中的输入项必须与“新密码”中的输入项匹配。

span.span: The default is "The confirm New Password entry must match the New Password entry."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件要求用户输入新密码两次，因为当用户键入密码时，密码字符会在屏幕上被屏蔽。The control requires the user to enter the new password twice because the password characters are masked on the screen as the user types them. 如果用户在 "新密码" 文本框和 "确认新密码" 文本框中输入的密码不相同，则显示属性中的消息。If the user does not enter the same password in both the New Password text box and the Confirm New Password text box, the message in the property is displayed. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

summary.span: 表示“继续”按钮的 值。

span.span: Represents value of the Continue button.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段表示 "继续" 按钮的值。 `CommandName` Use the field to represent the `CommandName` value of the Continue button. 当配置任何按钮以模拟控件的 "继续" 按钮的功能时，此功能很有用。This is useful when configuring any button to mimic the functionality of the Continue button of the control. 若要为控件中包含的任何控件分配 continue 功能，请将按钮的属性设置为字段中包含的字符串。To assign continue functionality to any control contained in the control, set the property of the button to the string that is contained in the field. "继续" 按钮可以出现在 ChangePassword 模板或 Success 模板上。The Continue button can appear on the ChangePassword template or the Success template. 单击 "继续" 按钮会将用户重定向到属性中存储的 URL。Clicking the Continue button redirects the user to the URL stored in the property. 若要将自定义功能添加到 "继续" 按钮，请为事件创建一个事件处理程序。To add custom functionality to the Continue button, create an event handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用于自定义属性的样式设置。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |设置Setting|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|"继续" 按钮的颜色。The color of the Continue button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|"继续" 按钮周围边框的颜色。The color of the border around the Continue button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|"继续" 按钮周围边框的样式。The style of the border around the Continue button. 样式可以是`"None"` `"Dotted"` 、 `"Solid"` 、、、 `"Double"`、 、、 `"Ridge"` 或。 `"Outset"` `"Dashed"` `"Groove"` `"Inset"`The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 默认值为 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 如果`BorderWidth`值大于2，则某些样式不会清晰显示。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|"继续" 按钮周围边框的宽度。The width of the border around the Continue button.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现 "继续" 按钮的级联样式表（CSS）类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Continue button. 如果指定了其他设置，则它们将重写样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true`若要以粗体显示 "继续" 按钮文本，则为。`true` to display the Continue button text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true`若要以斜体显示 "继续" 按钮文本，则为。`true` to display the Continue button text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true`如果为，则在 "继续" 按钮文本上方显示一条线。`true` to display the Continue button text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|对象形式的 "继续" 按钮中的文本大小。The size of the text in the Continue button as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true`将 "继续" 按钮文本显示为带删除线。`true` to display the Continue button text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true`显示带下划线的 "继续" 按钮文本。`true` to display the Continue button text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|"继续" 按钮中的文本颜色。The color of the text in the Continue button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`| ，它表示 "继续" 按钮的高度。A that represents the height of the Continue button.| |`Width`| ，它表示 "继续" 按钮的宽度。A that represents the width of the Continue button.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用户成功更改密码后将看到的网页的 URL。The property contains the URL of the Web page that users will see after successfully changing their password. 通过设置，可以控制用户在更改其密码后看到的第一页。By setting the , you can control the first page that users see after changing their password. 如果该属性为默认属性，则为字段; 当用户单击 "继续" 按钮时，将刷新该页并清除窗体上的任何值。If the property is the default, an field, when the user clicks the Continue button, the page is refreshed and any values on the form are cleared. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 获取用户的当前密码。

span.span: Gets the current password for the user.

value.span: 获取用户输入的当前密码。

span.span: The current password entered by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用户输入的当前密码。The property contains the current password entered by the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过 HTTP 传输密码是潜在的安全威胁。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. 恶意用户可以查看或破坏 HTTP 传输。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 若要在使用登录控件时提高安全性，应将 HTTPS 协议与安全套接字层（SSL）加密一起使用，以确保在回发过程中无法读取用户的密码。To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页，该页面使用控件，并包含名为`ChangingPassword`的事件的处理程序。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. `ChangingPassword`处理程序中的代码将属性中存储的旧密码与存储在中的新密码进行比较。The code in the `ChangingPassword` handler compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果这两个密码相同，则密码更改将失败。If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails. 控件将属性设置为`true` ，以使用户能够输入其用户名。 The control sets the property to `true` to enable users to enter their user name. 这意味着用户无需登录即可查看页面。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 此代码示例假定已将 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员身份和窗体身份验证，并且已创建一个用户知道其名称和密码。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：实现简单的窗体身份验证](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要更改其密码，必须由成员资格提供程序对用户进行身份验证。In order to change their password, users must be authenticated by the membership provider. 若要允许未登录的用户更改其密码，或使用其他用户帐户通过成员资格提供程序进行身份验证，然后更改该帐户的密码，则该控件可以显示一个控件以接受用户名。To allow users who are not logged on to change their password, or to be authenticated by the membership provider with a different user account and then change the password for that account, the control can display a control to accept the user name. 如果`true` 控件将向未登录的用户显示，则必须将属性设置为; 否则，用户将无法指定用户名。 You must set the property to `true` if the control will be displayed to users who are not logged on; otherwise, the user will not be able to specify a user name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性设置为向未登录到网站的用户显示控件。The following code example shows how to set the property to display the control to users who are not logged on to the Web site. [!code-aspx-csharp[ChangePasswordDisplayUserName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordDisplayUserName/CS/changepassworddisplayusernamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ChangePasswordDisplayUserName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordDisplayUserName/VB/changepassworddisplayusernamevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页，该页面使用控件，并包含名为`ChangingPassword`的事件的处理程序。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. `ChangingPassword`处理程序中的代码将属性中存储的旧密码与存储在中的新密码进行比较。The code in the `ChangingPassword` handler compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果这两个密码相同，则密码更改将失败。If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails. 控件将属性设置为`true` ，以使用户能够输入其用户名。 The control sets the property to `true` to enable the user to enter their user name. 这意味着用户无需登录即可查看页面。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 此代码示例假定已将 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员身份和窗体身份验证，并且已创建一个用户知道其名称和密码。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：实现简单的窗体身份验证](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A object that contains the properties that define the appearance of error messages on the control.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用于自定义属性的样式设置。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |设置Setting|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|出现在错误消息文本后面的颜色。The color that appears behind the error message text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|错误消息文本周围边框的颜色。The color of the border around the error message text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|错误消息文本周围边框的样式。The style of the border around the error message text. 样式可以是`"None"` `"Dotted"` 、 `"Solid"` 、、、 `"Double"`、 、、 `"Ridge"` 或。 `"Outset"` `"Dashed"` `"Groove"` `"Inset"`The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 默认值为 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 如果`BorderWidth`值大于2，则某些样式不会清晰显示。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|错误消息文本周围边框的宽度。The width of the border around the error message text.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现错误消息文本的级联样式表（CSS）类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the error message text. 如果指定了其他设置，则它们将重写样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true`为，则以粗体显示错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true`为，则以斜体类型显示错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true`如果为，则在错误消息文本上方显示一行。`true` to display the error message text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|作为对象的错误消息中的文本大小。The size of the text in the error message as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true`如果为，则显示超出的错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true`如果为，则显示带下划线的错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|错误消息文本中的文本颜色。The color of the text in the error message text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|一个 ，它表示错误消息文本的高度。A that represents the height of the error message text.| |`Width`|一个 ，它表示错误消息文本的宽度。A that represents the width of the error message text.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用于自定义属性的样式设置。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |设置Setting|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|文本框标签后的颜色。The color behind the text box labels. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|文本框标签周围边框的颜色。The color of the border around the text box labels. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|文本框标签周围边框的样式。The style of the border around the text box labels. 样式可以是`"None"` `"Dotted"` 、 `"Solid"` 、、、 `"Double"`、 、、 `"Ridge"` 或。 `"Outset"` `"Dashed"` `"Groove"` `"Inset"`The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 默认值为 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 如果`BorderWidth`值大于2，则某些样式不会清晰显示。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|文本框标签周围边框的宽度。The width of the border around the text box labels.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现文本框标签的级联样式表（CSS）类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the text box labels. 如果指定了其他设置，则它们将重写样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true`若要以粗体显示文本框标签文本，则为。`true` to display the text box labels text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true`若要以斜体类型显示文本框标签文本，则为。`true` to display the text box labels text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true`如果为，则在文本框标签文本上方显示一行。`true` to display the text box labels text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|作为对象的文本框标签中的文本大小。The size of the text in the text box labels as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true`显示带删除线的文本框标签文本。`true` to display the text box labels text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true`显示带下划线的文本框标签文本。`true` to display the text box labels text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|文本框标签中文本的颜色。The color of the text in the text box labels. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`| ，它表示文本框标签的高度。A that represents the height of the text box labels.| |`Width`| ，它表示文本框标签的宽度。A that represents the width of the text box labels.|

summary.span: 获取对一个属性集合的引用，这些属性定义了用户更改其密码后会接收到的电子邮件。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the email message that is sent to users after they have changed their password.

value.span: 对对象的引用，该对象定义发送给新用户的电子邮件。

span.span: A reference to a object that defines the email message sent to a new user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回对一组属性的引用，这些属性用于定义在用户更改其密码后发送给用户的电子邮件的格式和内容。The property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define the format and content of the email message sent to users after they have changed their password. 常见设置包括主题行和发件人的寄信人地址。Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address. 有关完整的属性列表，请参见 。For a complete list of properties, see . 属性是只读的; 但是，您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在 "窗体*属性*`-`"*子属性中*设置这些属性，其中 *，子属性表示* 类的`MailDefinition-Subject`属性（例如）。You can set these properties in the form *property*`-`*subproperty*, where *subproperty* represents a property of the class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`). 还可以在窗体*属性*`.`子*属性（例如*`MailDefinition.Subject`）中以编程方式设置属性。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form *Property*`.`*Subproperty* (for example,`MailDefinition.Subject`). 仅当用户具有使用成员资格提供程序注册的电子邮件地址，并且 属性的属性指向有效文件时，才会发送电子邮件。An email message is sent only if the user has an email address registered with the membership provider and if the property of the property points to a valid file. 如果设置了属性 ，则必须将属性设置为电子邮件地址; 否则，将引发异常。If the property is set, the property must be set to an email address; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 如果电子邮件是从对象创建的，它将进行下表中所示的替换。If the email message is created from the object, it will make the substitutions shown in the following table. 替换文本不区分大小写。The substitution text is case-insensitive. |替换文本Substitution text|替换为Replaced with| |-----------------------|-------------------| |**<%**`UserName`**%>****<%** `UserName` **%>**|用户的网站用户名。The Web site user name of the user.| |**\<%***密码***%>****\<%** *Password* **%>**|用户的新密码。The new password for the user.| `true`如果对象的属性为，则将对邮件的内容进行 HTML 编码，以防邮件收件人出现跨 站点脚本安全漏洞。If the property of the object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML-encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient. 可以使用事件修改对象创建的对象。You can use the event to modify the object that is created by the object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在电子邮件中发送用户帐户名或密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件通常以纯文本方式发送，可由特殊网络 "探查" 应用程序读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)中所述的缓解措施。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来定义将发送给更改密码的用户的电子邮件。The following code example shows how to use the property to define an email message that is sent to users who change their passwords. 它假定存在一个名`MailFile.txt`为的文件，其中包含要发送的电子邮件的文本。It assumes that there is a file called `MailFile.txt` that contains the text of the email message to send. 若要能够向用户发送电子邮件，必须在应用程序的 web.config 文件中配置电子邮件服务器。To be able to send email messages to users, you must configure an email server in the Web.config file for your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[笔尖：如何在 IIS 6.0 中安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For more information, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). [!code-aspx-csharp[ChangePasswordMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordMailDefinition/CS/changepasswordmaildefinitioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ChangePasswordMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordMailDefinition/VB/changepasswordmaildefinitionvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置用于查找成员信息的成员资格提供程序。The property gets or sets the membership provider that is used to look up member information. 如果属性为`null`或空，则使用默认`AspNetSqlMembershipProvider`的成员资格提供程序。 If the property is `null` or empty, the default membership provider, `AspNetSqlMembershipProvider`, is used. 有关可用于 ASP.NET 应用程序的成员资格提供程序的详细信息，请参阅[成员资格提供](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)程序。For more information about the membership providers available to ASP.NET applications, see [Membership Providers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f). 新密码必须满足、 和属性中的成员资格提供程序所设置的最低要求。The new password must meet the minimum requirements set by the membership provider in the , , and properties. 如果密码不符合这些要求， 则会引发事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

member this.NewPassword : string

summary.span: 获取用户输入的新密码。

span.span: Gets the new password entered by the user.

value.span: 用户输入的新密码。

span.span: The new password entered by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用户输入的新密码。The property contains the new password entered by the user. 您可以使用属性来定义新密码的要求。You can use the property to define the requirements for the new password. 此正则表达式用于在客户端强制实施密码规则。This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side. 与可以在数据存储级别配置的密码强制无关。The is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level. 密码必须满足、 和属性中的[成员资格提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)所设置的最低要求。The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the [membership provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f) in the , , and properties. 如果密码不符合这些要求， 则会引发事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过 HTTP 传输密码是潜在的安全威胁。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. 恶意用户可以查看或破坏 HTTP 传输。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 若要在使用登录控件时提高安全性，应将 HTTPS 协议与安全套接字层（SSL）加密一起使用，以确保在回发过程中无法读取用户的密码。To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页，该页面使用控件，并包含名为`ChangingPassword`的事件的处理程序。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. `ChangingPassword`将属性中存储的旧密码与存储在中的新密码进行比较。`ChangingPassword` compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果两者相同，则更改密码失败。If they are the same, changing the password fails. 控件将属性设置为`true` ，以使用户能够输入其用户名。 The control sets the property to `true` to enable the user to enter their user name. 这意味着用户无需登录即可查看页面。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 此代码示例假定已将 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员身份和窗体身份验证，并且已创建一个用户知道其名称和密码。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：实现简单的窗体身份验证](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The regular expression string used to validate the new password provided by the user.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可定义用于验证网站上的用户帐户的密码要求。Use the property to define the requirements for passwords that are used to validate user accounts on your Web site. 此正则表达式用于在客户端强制实施密码规则。This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side. 与可以在数据存储级别配置的密码强制无关。The is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level. 密码必须满足、 和属性中的[成员资格提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)所设置的最低要求。The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the [membership provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f) in the , , and properties. 如果密码不符合这些要求， 则会引发事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. 若要向用户显示要求，请设置属性。To display requirements to the user, set the property. 如果输入的密码未通过属性中包含的正则表达式，则会向用户显示该属性中包含的文本。If the password entered does not pass the regular expression contained in the property, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果成员资格提供程序拒绝了密码，则显示属性中包含的文本。If the password is rejected by the membership provider, the text contained in the property is displayed. 密码标准的常见用途是强制用户选择强密码。A common use of password standards is to force users to select strong passwords. 最佳做法是在成员资格提供程序中的数据级别强制执行密码规则。As a best practice, enforce password rules at the data level in the membership provider. 属性允许在客户端上检查密码，但不会锁定再次尝试登录的用户。The property allows for the convenience of checking the password on the client side, but does not lock out users who make repeated attempts to log on. 若要提高安全性，请配置成员资格提供程序，以限制用户登录所需的尝试次数。To improve security, configure your membership provider to restrict the number of attempts a user may make to log on. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护成员身份](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。For more information, see [Securing Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性以定义用于检查密码的正则表达式，以确保它们符合以下条件：The following code example shows how to set the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria: - 超过6个字符。Are greater than six characters. - 包含至少一个数字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一个特殊字符（非字母数字）。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 属性中包含的密码要求将显示给用户。The password requirements contained in the property are displayed to the user. 如果用户输入的密码不符合条件，则会向用户显示该属性中包含的文本。If the password entered by the user does not meet the criteria, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果未输入新密码，则会向用户显示该属性中包含的文本。If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. > [!NOTE] > 新密码还必须满足、 和属性中的[成员资格提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)所设置的最低要求。The new password must also meet the minimum requirements set by the [membership provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f) in the , , and properties. 如果密码不符合这些要求， 则会引发事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件包含 "更改密码" 和 "成功" 视图的子控件。The control contains child controls for the Change Password and Success views. 来自嵌套控件的事件是冒泡的，而不是每个按钮单独引发事件，而是将其发送到命名容器。Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are bubbled (that is, they are sent to the naming container). 命名容器进而引发用参数值调用`ItemCommand`的一般事件，使您可以确定哪个控件引发了原始事件。The naming container in turn raises a generic event called `ItemCommand` with parameter values that allow you to determine which individual control raised the original event. 通过响应此单个事件，你可以避免为单独的子控件编写事件处理方法。By responding to this single event, you can avoid writing event-handling methods for individual child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在属性 中指定的成员资格提供程序更改密码后，将调用方法。The method is called after the password is changed by the membership provider specified in the property. 调用方法后，将发生以下情况：After the method is called, the following occurs: - 如果设置了属性，则控件会尝试向用户发送电子邮件。If the property is set, the control attempts to send an email message to the user. - 用户被重定向到属性中指定的网站，或显示在属性中指定的控件模板。The user is either redirected to the Web site specified in the property or the control template specified in the property is displayed. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web Forms Pages 中的服务器事件处理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写方法时，请确保调用基类的方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性 中指定的成员资格提供程序在尝试更改用户的密码时遇到错误时，将调用方法。The method is called when the membership provider specified in the property encounters an error while attempting to change the user's password. 指定的对象不表示更改密码失败的原因，只是密码未更改。The specified object does not indicate the reason why changing the password failed, only that the password was not changed. 如果用户的密码未更改，请使用方法执行自定义操作。 Use the method to perform a custom action when the user's password is not changed. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web Forms Pages 中的服务器事件处理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写方法时，请确保调用基类的方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 在成员资格提供程序更改用户的密码之前引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event before the user's password is changed by the membership provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法，然后调用属性中指定的成员资格提供程序来更改用户的密码。 The method is called before the membership provider specified in the property is called to change the user's password. 使用方法来执行更改密码之前所需的任何处理，如检查新密码以确保它不在常用密码列表中。Use the method to perform any processing that is necessary before changing the password, such as checking the new password to make sure it is not in a list of common passwords. `true` 方法可以通过将作为 e 参数传递的对象的属性设置为来取消该事件。 The method can cancel the event by setting the property of the object passed as the *e* parameter to `true`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web Forms Pages 中的服务器事件处理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页，该页面使用控件，并包含名为`ChangingPassword`的事件的处理程序。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. `ChangingPassword`将属性中存储的旧密码与存储在中的新密码进行比较。`ChangingPassword` compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果这两个密码相同，则密码更改将失败。If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails. 控件将属性设置为`true` ，以使用户能够输入其用户名。 The control sets the property to `true` to enable the user to enter their user name. 这意味着用户无需登录即可查看页面。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 此代码示例假定已将 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员身份和窗体身份验证，并且已创建一个用户知道其名称和密码。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：实现简单的窗体身份验证](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服务器控件应执行创建和设置实例所需的任何初始化步骤。Web server controls should perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 此事件内不能使用视图状态信息;尚未填充。You cannot use view state information within this event; it is not populated yet. 不应访问方法中的另一个 Web 服务器控件，而不管它是控件的子控件还是父控件。You should not access another Web server control during the method, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to the control. 不一定要创建其他 Web 服务器控件并准备好进行访问。Other Web server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.

summary.span: 然后，SMTP 服务器将电子邮件发送给用户。

span.span: The SMTP server then sends the email message to the user.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用方法修改在用户更改其密码后发送给用户的电子邮件。Use the method to modify the email message that is sent to users after they change their password. 对象的属性将发送到 SMTP 服务器进行处理。The property of the object will be sent to the SMTP server for processing. 修改对象的属性以修改电子邮件。Modify the properties of the object to modify the email message. 仅当 属性 指定的对象的属性指向有效的文件名时，才会创建电子邮件。Email messages are created only when the property of the object specified by the property points to a valid file name. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在电子邮件中发送用户帐户名或密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件通常以纯文本方式发送，可由特殊网络 "探查" 应用程序读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)中所述的缓解措施。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web Forms Pages 中的服务器事件处理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个使用 Web 控件的 ASP.NET 页面，并包含名为`SendingMail`的事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 此代码示例假定已将 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员身份和窗体身份验证，并且已创建一个用户知道其名称和密码。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：实现简单的窗体身份验证](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密码更改成功，则代码会尝试使用 SMTP 向用户发送电子邮件，以确认更改。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 这是在`SendingMail`事件处理程序中完成的。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 有关如何配置 SMTP 服务器的信息，请参阅[在 IIS 6.0 中，如何：安装和配置 Smtp 虚拟服务器](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 出于本示例的目的，不需要配置 SMTP 服务器;该示例构造为测试发送电子邮件失败的情况。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生其他错误，并且无法发送电子邮件，则调用该`SendMailError`函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 向用户显示一条消息。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，将事件记录到 Windows 应用程序事件日志中，假定名为 MySamplesSite 的事件源已存在。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 请参阅下面的代码示例，以创建指定的事件源。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 有关创建事件源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 对象的属性设置为`true` ，以指示已处理错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果需要以编程方式将名为 MySamplesSite 的事件源添加到应用程序日志，请使用以下代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 要使第一个代码示例正常工作，必须存在此事件源。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下面的示例代码可用作前面的示例代码的 ChangePasswordMail 文件。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在电子邮件中发送用户帐户名或密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件通常以纯文本方式发送，可由特殊网络 "探查" 应用程序读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)中所述的缓解措施。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

Your password for the account named "<%Username%>" has changed.

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```

## Remarks 当 SMTP 邮件系统在用户更改密码后尝试发送电子邮件时，将调用方法。 The method is called when the SMTP mail system raises an exception while attempting to send an email message after a user has changed a password. 检查作为 参数传递的对象的属性，以确定异常的实际原因。 `e`Examine the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception. 最常见的原因是 web.config 文件的`smtp`节中有一个配置错误。The most common reason is a configuration error in the `smtp` section of the Web.config file. 您必须将`e`作为参数传递的对象的属性设置为`true` ，以指示已处理异常，否则，将再次引发异常。You must set the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to `true` to signal that the exception has been taken care of; otherwise, the exception is thrown again. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 出于本示例的目的，不需要配置 SMTP 服务器;该示例构造为测试发送电子邮件失败的情况。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生其他错误，并且无法发送电子邮件，则调用该`SendMailError`函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other the specified event source. 有关创建事件源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 对象的属性设置为`true` ，以指示已处理错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果需要以编程方式将名为 MySamplesSite 的事件源添加到应用程序日志，请使用以下代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 要使第一个代码示例正常工作，必须存在此事件源。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下面的示例代码可用作前面的示例代码的 ChangePasswordMail 文件。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在电子邮件中发送用户帐户名或密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件通常以纯文本方式发送，可由特殊网络 "探查" 应用程序读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)中所述的缓解措施。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

summary.span: 获取一个对定义 控件上提示文本显示效果的 属性集的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of hint text that appears on the control.

value.span: 一个 对象，其中包含定义 属性中所含文本的显示效果的 属性。

span.span: A object that contains the properties that define the appearance of the text contained in the property.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用于自定义属性的样式设置。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |设置Setting|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|提示文本后面的颜色。The color behind the hint text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|提示文本周围边框的颜色。The color of the border around the hint text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|提示文本周围边框的样式。The style of the border around the hint text. 样式可以是 "None"、"虚线"、"虚线"、"实线"、"Double"、"沟"、"凸"、"内陷" 或 "外嵌"。The style can be "None", "Dotted", "Dashed", "Solid", "Double", "Groove", "Ridge", "Inset", or "Outset". 默认值为 "NotSet"。The default is "NotSet". 如果`BorderWidth`值大于2，则某些样式不会清晰显示。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|提示文本周围边框的宽度。The width of the border around the hint text.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现提示文本的级联样式表（CSS）类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the hint text. 如果指定了其他设置，则它们将重写样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true`为，则以粗体显示提示文本。`true` to display the hint text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true`为，则以斜体显示提示文本。`true` to display the hint text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true`如果为，则在提示文本上方显示一行。`true` to display the hint text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|提示文本中作为对象的文本大小。The size of the text in the hint text as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true`将提示文本显示为带删除线。`true` to display the hint text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true`显示带下划线的提示文本。`true` to display the hint text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|提示文本中文本的颜色。The color of the text in the hint text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|表示提示文本的高度的。A that represents the height of the hint text.| |`Width`|表示提示文本的宽度的。A that represents the width of the hint text.|
