summary.span: 获取或设置有关对创建网站密码的要求的信息性文本。

span.span: Gets or sets informational text about the requirements for creating a password for the Web site.

value.span: 有关新密码需符合的条件的信息性显示文本。

span.span: The informational text to display about the criteria for the new password.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置有关创建网站密码的要求的信息性文本。The property gets or sets informational text about the requirements for creating a password for the Web site. 使用此属性描述在属性中指定的新密码要求。Use this property to describe the requirements for the new password that are specified in the property. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性以定义用于检查密码的正则表达式，以确保它们符合以下条件：The following code example shows how to set the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria: - 超过6个字符。Are greater than six characters. - 包含至少一个数字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一个特殊字符（非字母数字）。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 属性中包含的密码要求将显示给用户。The password requirements contained in the property are displayed to the user. 如果用户输入的密码不符合条件，则会向用户显示该属性中包含的文本。If the password entered by the user does not meet the criteria, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果未输入新密码，则会向用户显示该属性中包含的文本。If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. > [!NOTE] > 新密码还必须满足、 和属性中的[成员资格提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)所设置的最低要求。The new password must also meet the minimum requirements set by the [membership provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f) in the , , and properties. 如果密码不符合这些要求， 则会引发事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. [!code-aspx-csharp[ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex/CS/changepasswordpasswordregexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex/VB/changepasswordpasswordregexvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使内联样式属性（如 ）应用于为控件呈现的所有 html，ASP.NET 将呈现的 html 包含`table`在元素中。In order to make inline style properties such as apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element. 如果你不希望呈现外部`table`元素，请将此属性设置为。 `false`If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`. 在这种情况下，如果尝试设置适用于整个控件的内联样式属性，则会引发异常。In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.

summary.span: 保存将页面回发到服务器之后发生的所有服务器控件状态更改。

span.span: Saves any server control state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 服务器控件的当前状态，否则为 。

span.span: The server control's current state; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可保存控件操作所需的状态信息。 Use the method to save state information required for the operation of the control. 此控件状态数据与控件的视图状态数据分开存储。This control state data is stored separately from the view state data for the control. 在保存控件状态之前， 使用控件状态的自定义控件必须对对象调用方法。Custom controls using control state must call the method on the object before saving control state.

para.span: 保存控件状态时，字符串对象将作为存储在 HTML <输入类型 => "hidden"/元素中的变量返回给客户端。

span.span: When control state is saved, a string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML <input type="hidden" /> element.

para.span: 重写方法以提取要在控件中使用的状态信息。

span.span: Override the method to extract the state information to use in the control.

para.span: 控件状态适用于少量的关键数据，如页索引或关键字。

summary.span: 保存自页面回发到服务器后发生的任何服务器控件视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves any server control view state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 服务器控件的当前视图状态，否则为 。

span.span: The server control's current view state; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态是控件的属性值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of the properties for the control. 这些值自动放置在 控件的属性中，这是类的实例。These values are automatically placed in the property for the control, which is an instance of the class. 然后，将属性的值保存到控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。The value for the property is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the control life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页生命周期概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991). 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象将作为存储在 HTML ``元素中的变量返回给客户端。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `` element. 创作自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写方法并修改控件的属性来提高效率。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the property for the control.

summary.span: 在向用户发送密码已更改的电子邮件确认之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the user is sent an email confirmation that the password has been changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当属性定义要发送的电子邮件时，控件将发送一封电子邮件， 确认密码已更改。 The control will send an email message confirming that the password has been changed when the property defines an email message to send. 电子邮件包含用户名和密码的自动替换字段。The email message contains automatic replacement fields for the user name and password. 在将电子邮件发送给用户之前，可以使用事件来修改它。You can use the event to modify the email message before it is sent to the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在电子邮件中发送用户帐户名或密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件通常以纯文本方式发送，可由特殊网络 "探查" 应用程序读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)中所述的缓解措施。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个使用 Web 控件的 ASP.NET 页面，并包含名为`SendingMail`的事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 此代码示例假定已将 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员身份和窗体身份验证，并且已创建一个用户知道其名称和密码。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：实现简单的窗体身份验证](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密码更改成功，则代码会尝试使用 SMTP 向用户发送电子邮件，以确认更改。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 这是在`SendingMail`事件处理程序中完成的。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 有关如何配置 SMTP 服务器的信息，请参阅[在 IIS 6.0 中，如何：安装和配置 Smtp 虚拟服务器](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 出于本示例的目的，不需要配置 SMTP 服务器;该示例构造为测试发送电子邮件失败的情况。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生其他错误，并且无法发送电子邮件，则调用该`SendMailError`函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 向用户显示一条消息。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，将事件记录到 Windows 应用程序事件日志中，假定名为 MySamplesSite 的事件源已存在。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 请参阅下面的代码示例，以创建指定的事件源。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 有关创建事件源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 对象的属性设置为`true` ，以指示已处理错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果需要以编程方式将名为 MySamplesSite 的事件源添加到应用程序日志，请使用以下代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 要使第一个代码示例正常工作，必须存在此事件源。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下面的示例代码可用作前面的示例代码的 ChangePasswordMail 文件。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在电子邮件中发送用户帐户名或密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件通常以纯文本方式发送，可由特殊网络 "探查" 应用程序读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)中所述的缓解措施。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

Your password for the account named "<%Username%>" has changed.

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```

summary.span: 在向用户发送电子邮件的过程中出现 SMTP 错误时发生。

span.span: Occurs when there is an SMTP error sending an email message to the user.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当 SMTP 邮件提供程序在用户更改其密码后尝试发送电子邮件时引发异常时，将引发事件。 The event is raised when the SMTP mail provider throws an exception when trying to send an email message after users have changed their password. 引发此事件的最常见原因是`smtp` web.config 文件的部分不正确。The most common reason that this event is raised is that the `smtp` section of the Web.config file is incorrect. 有关部分的`smtp`详细信息，请参阅[ \ 元素（网络设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md)。For more information about the `smtp` section, see [\ Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md). 默认事件处理程序不会捕获或处理邮件系统中的 SMTP 错误。The default event handler does not catch or handle the SMTP error from the mail system. 事件处理程序必须将对象的属性设置为， `true`以便阻止向用户显示错误。 Your event handler must set the property of the object to `true` in order to stop the error from being displayed to users. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个使用 Web span.span: The URL of the destination page after the password is changed.

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望用户在成功更改密码后重定向到网站的特定页面，请设置属性。 Set the property when you want users to be redirected to a specific page of your Web site after successfully changing their passwords. 如果未设置 属性（设置为默认值），则将刷新包含控件的页面并显示属性。 If the property is not set (set is the default), the page containing the control is refreshed and the property is displayed. 如果设置了属性，则不会显示 "成功" 视图。 If the property is set, the Success view is not displayed. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定控件所 使用的对象。 The property specifies the object that is used by the control. 仅当使用代码隐藏文件时，才能访问属性。The property is accessible only when using a code-behind file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：动态创建 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件模板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4)。For more information, see [How To: Create ASP.NET Web Server Control Templates Dynamically](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4). 模板是一组 HTML 元素和控件，它们构成控件特定部分的布局。A template is a set of HTML elements and controls that make up the layout for a particular portion of a control. 模板不同于样式：Templates differ from styles: - 模板定义控件的部分内容。Templates define the content of a section of a control. - 样式指定控件中元素的外观。Styles specify the appearance of elements in the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Web 服务器控件模板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae)和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see [Web Server Controls Templates](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae) and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 控件支持以下模板，这些模板应用于相应的控件视图。The control supports the following templates, which are applied to the corresponding control view. |模板名称Template name|控件视图Control view| |-------------------|------------------| ||更改密码视图Change Password view| ||成功视图Success view| 你还可以在 .aspx 文件中创建或修改控件的模板。You can also create or modify the template for a control in your .aspx file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：以声明方式创建 ASP.NET Web 控件模板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a)。For more information, see [How to: Create ASP.NET Web Control Templates Declaratively](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用于自定义属性的样式设置。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |设置Setting|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|成功视图文本后的颜色。The color behind the Success view text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|"成功" 视图文本周围边框的颜色。The color of the border around the Success view text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|成功视图文本周围边框的样式。The style of the border around the Success view text. 样式可以是`"None"` `"Dotted"` 、 `"Solid"` 、、、 `"Double"`、 、、 `"Ridge"` 或。 `"Outset"` `"Dashed"` `"Groove"` `"Inset"`The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 默认值为 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 如果`BorderWidth`值大于2，则某些样式不会清晰显示。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|成功视图文本周围边框的宽度。The width of the border around the Success view text.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现 "成功" 视图文本的级联样式表（CSS）类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Success view text. 如果指定了其他设置，则它们将重写样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true`为，则以粗体显示 "成功" 视图文本。`true` to display the Success view text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true`为，则以斜体显示 "成功" 视图文本。`true` to display the Success view text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true`若要在 "成功" 视图文本上显示一条线。`true` to display the Success view text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|作为对象的 "成功" 视图文本中的文本大小。The size of the text in the Success view text as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true`如果为，则显示 "成功" 视图文本。`true` to display the Success view text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true`为，则显示带下划线的 "成功" 视图文本。`true` to display the Success view text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|"成功" 视图文本中的文本颜色。The color of the text in the Success view text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`| ，它表示成功视图文本的高度。A that represents the height of the Success view text.| |`Width`| ，它表示成功视图文本的宽度。A that represents the width of the Success view text.|

summary.span: 获取或设置要更改其密码的网站用户名。

span.span: Gets or sets the Web site user name for which to change the password.

value.span: 要更改其密码的用户名。

span.span: The user name for which to change the password.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性获取要为其更改密码的网站用户名。The property gets the Web site user name for which to change the password. 你还可以使用属性来从控件内获取用户名，而无需更改密码。You can also use the property just to get the user name from within the control, without changing the password. 此外，可以从已创建的电子邮件中使用该属性，以便通过在电子邮件正文中使用字符串 "\<% UserName% >" 发送电子邮件。Additionally, the property can be used from within an email message that has been created to send email from the control by using the string "\<%UserName%>" in the body of the email message. 若要允许用户键入用户名，请将属性设置为。 `true`To allow the user to type in a user name, set the property to `true`. 如果用户已经过身份验证，则不需要输入用户名。If a user is already authenticated, he or she does not need to enter a user name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个使用 Web 控件的 ASP.NET 页面，并包含名为`SendingMail`的事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 此代码示例假定已将 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员身份和窗体身份验证，并且已创建一个用户知道其名称和密码。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：实现简单的窗体身份验证](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密码更改成功，则代码会尝试使用 SMTP 向用户发送电子邮件，以确认更改。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 这是在`SendingMail`事件处理程序中完成的。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 有关如何配置 SMTP 服务器的信息，请参阅[在 IIS 6.0 中，如何：安装和配置 Smtp 虚拟服务器](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 出于本示例的目的，不需要配置 SMTP 服务器;该示例构造为测试发送电子邮件失败的情况。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生其他错误，并且无法发送电子邮件，则调用该`SendMailError`函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 向用户显示一条消息。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，将事件记录到 Windows 应用程序事件日志中，假定名为 MySamplesSite 的事件源已存在。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 请参阅下面的代码示例，以创建指定的事件源。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 有关创建事件源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 对象的属性设置为`true` ，以指示已处理错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果需要以编程方式将名为 MySamplesSite 的事件源添加到应用程序日志，请使用以下代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 要使第一个代码示例正常工作，必须存在此事件源。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下面的示例代码可用作前面的示例代码的 ChangePasswordMail 文件。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在电子邮件中发送用户帐户名或密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件通常以纯文本方式发送，可由特殊网络 "探查" 应用程序读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)中所述的缓解措施。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

Your password for the account named "<%Username%>" has changed.

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用于自定义属性的样式设置。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |设置Setting|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|错误消息后面的颜色。The color behind the error messages. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|错误消息周围边框的颜色。The color of the border around the error messages. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|错误消息周围边框的样式。The style of the border around the error messages. 样式可以是 "None"、"虚线"、"虚线"、"实线"、"Double"、"沟"、"凸"、"内陷" 或 "外嵌"。The style can be "None", "Dotted", "Dashed", "Solid", "Double", "Groove", "Ridge", "Inset", or "Outset". 默认值为 "NotSet"。The default is "NotSet". 如果`BorderWidth`值大于2，则某些样式不会清晰显示。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|错误消息周围边框的宽度。The width of the border around the error messages.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现错误消息的级联样式表（CSS）类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the error messages. 如果指定了其他设置，则它们将重写样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true`以粗体显示错误消息文本。`true` to display the error messages text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true`为，则以斜体类型显示错误消息文本。`true` to display the error messages text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true`如果为，则在错误消息上方显示一行。`true` to display the error messages text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|作为对象的错误消息中的文本大小。The size of the text in the error messages as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true`如果为，则显示超出的错误消息文本。`true` to display the error messages text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true`如果为，则显示带下划线的错误消息文本。`true` to display the error messages text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|错误消息中的文本颜色。The color of the text in the error messages. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|表示错误消息的高度的。A that represents the height of the error messages.| |`Width`|一个 ，它表示错误消息的宽度。A that represents the width of the error messages.|
